name: OBT
description:
Winner of Microsoft Hosting Partner of the Year 2011 and 2012, OBT is a pioneer in the area of Private Cloud services, delivering hosted services to SMEs and Enterprise since 1999, leading the way in innovation, efficiency and security in the area of hosting sensitive data and business applications.

Established in 1999, OBT is a pioneering and innovative private cloud service provider. Through its Anywhere Suite and flagship offerings, Desktop Anywhere® and white-label Hosted Lync, OBT delivers a customised technology infrastructure via the cloud – all for the purpose of making business easier. With a focus on having the right people to create a framework to support its customers in each stage of their growth, OBT offers customisable services to customers, either directly or indirectly.
OBT is able to deliver its services globally, with offices/data centres in Sydney, Melbourne, Singapore, Dublin and Salt Lake City.
OBT is a Microsoft Gold Hosting Partner. The company was named Microsoft Australia SaaS Hosting Partner of the Year 2011 and again in 2012
